tags.name: DepartmentController
tags.description: Exposes APIs to work with Department resource.

tags.name: EmployeeController
tags.description: Exposes APIs to work with Employee resource.

tags.name: UserController
tags.description: Exposes APIs to work with User resource.

tags.name: VacationController
tags.description: Exposes APIs to work with Vacation resource.

get.description: Returns the paginated list of Department instances matching the optional query (q) request param. If there is no query provided, it returns all the instances. Pagination & Sorting parameters such as page& size, sort can be sent as request parameters. The sort value should be a comma separated list of field names & optional sort order to sort the data on. eg: field1 asc, field2 desc etc

post.description: Creates a new Department instance.
Returns aggregated result with given aggregation info

get.description: Returns the total count of Department instances matching the optional query (q) request param.
Returns the matching Department with given unique key values.

post.description: Returns a URL to download a file for the data matching the optional query (q) request param and the required fields provided in the Export Options.

get.description: Returns downloadable file for the data matching the optional query (q) request param.

post.description: Returns the paginated list of Department instances matching the optional query (q) request param. This API should be used only if the query string is too big to fit in GET request with request param. The request has to made in application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.
Returns the list of Department instances matching the search criteria.

get.description: Returns the Department instance associated with the given id.

put.description: Updates the Department instance associated with the given id.

delete.description: Deletes the Department instance associated with the given id.

patch.description: Partially updates the Department instance associated with the given id.

get.description: Gets the employees instance associated with the given id.

Returns the list of Employee instances matching the search criteria.

get.description: Returns the Employee instance associated with the given id.

put.description: Updates the Employee instance associated with the given id.

delete.description: Deletes the Employee instance associated with the given id.

patch.description: Partially updates the Employee instance associated with the given id.

get.description: Gets the employeesForManagerId instance associated with the given id.
Gets the vacations instance associated with the given id.
